title: Talons Q coded as an aa now
body: i was playing talon hoping for a 9 sec death fire touch bleed from my q, its was going to be obnoxious but entertaining. but unlike on pbe this does not work on live D: rip.

replies.body: I thought of the same idea, but I didn't play Pbe, and it didn't work but glad to know that worked before tho. If it does work again, than I would for sure choose this keystone over the other one as Talon.
